name: @sanalabs/json
description: Utility functions to validate and mutate JSON (patch and merge)

scripts.build:cjs: rm -rf dict/cjs && npx tsc --outDir dist/cjs --module commonjs
scripts.build:esm: rm -rf dist/esm && npx tsc --outDir dist/esm --module esnext
scripts.build: yarn run build:cjs && yarn run build:esm
